description:
Constructed with durable Cordura® ripstop nylon, this sleeveless vest is designed for outdoor adventures. Its PFC-free water-repellent finish ensures protection against light rain and moisture. The lightweight design and breathable construction offer freedom of movement and comfort during active pursuits.

Packable and easy to carry, this vest is a practical addition to your backpack. This versatile garment is fitting for various outdoor activities, from hiking to camping.
name: Hooke Lightweight Insulated Vest - Mens
